TextBody:
Hello Alex,

The Hotfix should be available in Dashboard -> Live update after clicking the "Check Now" button.
You can apply the patch by clicking on the tickbox on the left side of the patch name -> Apply update.
Let me know if you will face any issues while applying the patch.

Best regards,
Emil

TextBody:
Hello Alex,

Sure, here are the offline patches:

Offline patch for addressing the vulnerability on the EPP Server:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/MP-HWA-EPP4-U8800.tar.gz

Offline patch to import the latest EPP Clients in the EPP Server
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_agent_patches/MP-HWA-EPP4-U0088-M0002.tar.gz

Best regards,
Emil
